## Learning Objectives

- Rename and recode variables using `rename()`, `recode()`, and `case_when()`
- Identify syntactic vs. non-syntactic variable names and handle them correctly
- Detect, handle, and clean explicit missing data using common tools
- Importing and Exporting data in R
- Manage relational data with `dplyr` (e.g., linking and merging related tables)


## Readings

- Importing data: ["Chapter 7 Data import"](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/data-import.html) from "R for Data Science" 2nd Edition and [readr Documentation](https://readr.tidyverse.org/index.html)
- Missing data: ["Chapter 18 Missing values"](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/missing-values.html) from "R for Data Science" 2nd Edition
- Relational data: ["Chapter 19 Joins"](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/joins) from "R for Data Science" 2nd Edition
